solution_line_template: The number of words that Carl can type per hour is {carl_wpm} * {minutes_per_hour} = <<{carl_wpm}*{minutes_per_hour}={carl_wph}>>{carl_wph} words.
The number of words that Carl can type in {hours_per_day} hours is {carl_wph} * {hours_per_day} = <<{carl_wph}*{hours_per_day}={carl_per_day}>>{carl_per_day} words.
The number of words that Carl can type in {num_days} days is {carl_per_day} * {num_days} = <<{carl_per_day}*{num_days}={total_words}>>{total_words} words.
